answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Alphonso - visit the Johnson & Fabian Advisory Group's Fiscal Health and Wellness Blog where I think you'll find helpful information, documents and articles that speak directly to aligning resources with priorities:    
http://fiscalhealthandwellness.blogspot.com
They're contact information is:  
Jon Johnson & Chris Fabian  
Johnson & Fabian Advisory Group  
303-909-9052 or 303-520-1356  
jjohnson.jfadvisors@earthink.net  
cfabian.jfadvisors@earthlink.net  
Pam  
Pamela Muse  
Western Regional Director  
Alliance for Innovation  
888-468-6450   
pmuse@transformgov.org  
www.transformgov.org

author: Alphonso Jefferson
text: Does anyone have an example of a matrix that was used as part of the budget process to align available resources to prioritities?  I am looking at some improvement areas, and would like to see examples that have been used in other organizations.
title: Matrices Used to Align Resources to Priorities
